Title: Russo-Ukrainian War, day 965: Ukraine destroys over 10,000 Russia...
Description: Ukraine's military has reported the destruction of more than 10,000 Russian artillery systems since the beginning of 2024, with losses estimated at $8 billion.

Description: NATO's senior representative in Ukraine, Patrick Turner, revealed that Russia's increased use of sabotage, cyberattacks, and other hybrid tactics against the West will not stop the Alliance from backing Ukraine and countering these aggressive actions.

Title: Ukrainian military destroys over 10,000 Russian artillery systems...
Description: Since the start of 2024, Ukraine’s military has taken out 10,373 Russian artillery systems, with losses estimated at $8 billion, significantly crippling Russia’s artillery brigades.

Title: Reuters: Spain detains members of smuggling network supplying ban...
Description: Spanish police arrested four individuals linked to a crime ring suspected of smuggling 13 tons of banned chemicals to Russia, potentially including chemical weapons precursors, as part of an effort to evade Western sanctions imposed for the invasion of Ukraine.

Title: Ukraine’s Foreign Minister calls on Europe to fight Russia’s shad...
Description: The calls follow the reports that Russian oil exports through the so-called shadow fleet have nearly doubled over the past year, reaching 4.1 million barrels per day.

Title: Two Crimean collaborators fighting for Russia captured by Ukraine...
Description: The suspected traitors, aged 51 and 45, joined the Russian forces after the 2014 annexation of Crimea and served in the 810th Separate Guards Naval Infantry Brigade.

Title: Russians search for 18 North Korean deserters near Ukraine’s bord...
Description: The source says DPRK soldiers have fled their positions in Russia's Bryansk and Kursk oblasts, while the Russian military searches for deserters and hides the incident from superiors.

Title: Ukraine and Mauritius approve visa-free agreement
Description: Ukraine and Mauritius have signed an agreement allowing their citizens to travel between the two countries without visas for up to 90 days, as announced by a Ukrainian government representative.

Title: Forbes: High-stakes tech race unfolds in Ukraine’s drone-dominate...
Description: Ukraine's drone interceptors are blinding Russian reconnaissance, impacting long-range attacks in a high-speed technological arms race over Ukrainian skies.

Title: Russian deliberate policy of violence: Ukraine reports surge in e...
Description: Ukrainian authorities have raised alarm over the rising death toll of Ukrainian prisoners of war.

Title: Energy Community: Ukrenergo certification as independent operator...
Description: In a recent letter, the Energy Community emphasized that ongoing certification efforts for 'Ukrenergo' will not affect Ukraine's ability to import electricity from the EU this winter, countering previous warnings of potential disruptions.

Title: India sharply reduced purchases of Russian coal
Description: India slashed its imports of Russian coal by 26% in the first nine months of 2024, signaling a major shift in the global coal trade.

Title: Czech Republic to return its ambassador to Moscow amid Russia’s w...
Description: The Czech Republic named Daniel Koštoval, a diplomat and former deputy defense minister, as its new ambassador to Moscow, set to take office in early 2025 after almost a three-year break.
